//Array of happy quotes const quotes = [ "...and you are awesome!", "...and you've got this!", "...have a wonderful day!", "...and so is this puppy!üê∂" ]; //randomly choose one from quotes var random_quote = quotes[Math.floor(Math.random() * Math.floor(quotes.length))]; //append random quote to .vibe class document.querySelector('.vibe').append(random_quote);
